project.name: Testament
project.description: Real exam questions from real university exams - organized by topic with step-by-step solutions

components.index_card: Bordered card with subtle shadow, paper-aged background
components.exam_stamp: Rotated red border stamp for authenticity
components.blueprint_button: Navy background with offset border effect

database_schema.users: id, email, password_hash, credits, has_unlimited, unlimited_until
database_schema.sessions: id, user_id, expires_at - JWT session management
database_schema.courses: id, name, description, exam_count - calc2, calc3, etc.
database_schema.topics: id, course_id, name, slug, category, frequency_score
database_schema.questions: id, topic_id, question_text, solution_steps, source attribution

design_combination.kimi_strengths: GSAP scroll animations, horizontal navigation, pinned sections, graph paper aesthetic
design_combination.stitch_strengths: Library checkout card style, exam stamps, technical footer, authenticity
design_combination.approach: Use Kimi as base, add Stitch elements selectively (exam stamp, checkout card, technical footer)
design_combination.avoid: Sideways navigation text (hard to read), bright yellow (reduce to 40% opacity)

scroll_behavior.snap_behavior: Global snap to section centers during exit phases

structure: docs/ - Clean documentation (PRD, Tech Stack, App Flow, Design System)

monetization_strategy.psychology: Credits create commitment device; unlimited removes friction for power users

frontend: Add Stitch design elements (exam stamp, checkout card)
